subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Making Jason Kidd, who only last week announced his retirement as a player, a head coach without an intermediary step would be a risk for the Nets and perhaps unfair to Kidd.
snippet: Making Jason Kidd, who only last week announced his retirement as a player, a head coach without an intermediary step would be a risk for the Nets and perhaps unfair to Kidd.
